tasks.label: assets:copy
tasks.command: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$root = (Get-Location).Path; $src = Join-Path $root 'node_modules'; $destJs = Join-Path $root 'wwwroot/js'; $destCss = Join-Path $root 'wwwroot/css'; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $destJs | Out-Null; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $destCss | Out-Null; Copy-Item -Path (Join-Path $src 'jquery/dist/jquery.min.js') -Destination (Join-Path $destJs 'jquery.min.js') -Force; Copy-Item -Path (Join-Path $src 'toastr/build/toastr.min.js') -Destination (Join-Path $destJs 'toastr.min.js') -Force; Copy-Item -Path (Join-Path $src 'toastr/build/toastr.min.css') -Destination (Join-Path $destCss 'toastr.min.css') -Force"
